system.summary: Create or continue working on a small non-mechanical trinket.

description.value:
You can create one non-mechanized trinket or small object. So long as you have relevant materials equal to ¾ of the trinket’s cost, you can work on creating the item over the course of short or long rests. Each Rest Action you spend working on it, make an Intelligence (Craft) check against DC 10. Each success counts as 1 completed work session; a failure does not. Depending on the item’s actual cost, it takes more work sessions to complete.

See @Compendium[undertaking.tables.OANH1Q51JDEB8ETI]{Tinkercraft} table.
